equation:
\begin{equation}\label{SQED_Action}
S_0 = \frac{1}{4 e^2} \mbox{Re}\int d^4x\,d^2\theta\,W_a C^{ab} W_b
+ \frac{1}{4}\int d^4x\, d^4\theta\,
\Big(\phi^* e^{2V}\phi +\tilde\phi^*
e^{-2V}\tilde\phi\Big).
\

\begin{equation}
S_{gf} = - \frac{1}{64 e^2}\int d^4x\,d^4\theta\,
\Bigg(V D^2 \bar D^2
\Big(1 + \frac{\partial^{2n}}{\Lambda^{2n}}\Big) V
+ V \bar D^2 D^2
\Big(1+ \frac{\partial^{2n}}{\Lambda^{2n}}\Big) V\Bigg),
\

\begin{equation}
S_{gauge} + S_{gf} = \frac{1}{4 e^2}\int d^4x\,d^4\theta
V\partial^2 \Big(1+ \frac{\partial^{2n}}{\Lambda^{2n}}\Big) V.
\

\begin{equation}\label{Gamma}
\Gamma = W - \int d^4x\,d^4\theta\,J V
- \int d^4x\,d^2\theta\, \Big(j\,\phi + \tilde j\,\tilde\phi \Big)
- \int d^4x\,d^2\bar\theta\,
\Big(j^*\phi^* + \tilde j^* \tilde\phi^* \Big),
\

\begin{equation}
V = \frac{\delta W}{\delta J};\qquad
\phi = \frac{\delta W}{\delta j};\qquad
\tilde\phi = \frac{\delta W}{\delta\tilde j}.
\

\begin{equation}\label{Two_Loop_Effective_Action_HD}
\Delta\Gamma^{(2)}_{V} = \mbox{Re} \int d^2\theta\,
\frac{d^4p}{(2\pi)^4} W_a(p) C^{ab} W_b(-p)
\Big(f_1 + f_2 + f_{2PV} + f_3 \Big),
\

\begin{equation}\label{Two_Loop_Effective_Action_DRED}
\Delta\Gamma^{(2)}_{V} = \mbox{Re} \int d^2\theta\,
\frac{d^4p}{(2\pi)^4} W_a(p) C^{ab} W_b(-p)
\Big(\tilde f_1 + \tilde f_2 + \tilde f_3 \Big),
\

\begin{equation}\label{Full_Anomaly}
\Big\langle \bar D^2 \Big(\phi^* e^{2V}\phi
+ \tilde\phi^* e^{-2V}\tilde\phi\Big)\Big\rangle
= \frac{1}{2\pi^2} W_a C^{ab} W_b + \mbox{const}.
\

\begin{equation}\label{Konishi_Anomaly}
\Big\langle \frac{1}{4}\int d^4x\,d^4\theta\,\Big(\phi^* e^{2V}\phi
+ \tilde\phi^* e^{-2V}\tilde\phi\Big)\Big\rangle
= -\frac{1}{16\pi^2} \mbox{Re}\int d^4x\,d^2\theta\,W_a C^{ab} W_b.
\

\begin{equation}\label{SQED_Action}
S_0 = \frac{1}{4 e^2} \mbox{Re}\int d^4x\,d^2\theta\,W_a C^{ab} W_b
+ \frac{1}{4}\int d^4x\, d^4\theta\,
\Big(\phi^* e^{2V}\phi +\tilde\phi^*
e^{-2V}\tilde\phi\Big).
\

\Big(1 + \frac{\partial^{2n}}{\Lambda^{2n}}\Big) V

\
